abstract.p: Summary of some major news stories on inside pages

block.p: Yemen Link to Buffalo Cell Officials say an American believed to have been killed by a C.I.A. missile in Yemen was probably the ringleader of a Buffalo terror cell.
Cracking Down on Night Life The Bloomberg administration is increasing enforcement of regulations that restrain the activities of clubs, bars and restaurants.
Yemen Link to Buffalo Cell Officials say an American believed to have been killed by a C.I.A. missile in Yemen was probably the ringleader of a Buffalo terror cell.
Cracking Down on Night Life The Bloomberg administration is increasing enforcement of regulations that restrain the activities of clubs, bars and restaurants.
G.O.P. Hit Georgia's Streets Republicans surged to power in Georgia by getting more voters to the polls than ever before.
SPECIAL TODAY What Works in the Schools? James Traub reports on the Bush administration's push to figure out what works in the classroom.
